summary: This bill, the ESP, Paraprofessional, and Education Support Staff Family Leave Act, amends the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to establish eligibility requirements for educational support staff (paraprofessionals and other support staff) to take leave. It defines covered employees and clarifies how their eligibility for family and medical leave will be determined, considering the nature of their employment within the school year. The bill also tasks the Secretary to provide methods for calculating leave for these employees.
